item.title: borgogna art gallery
item.description: The Borgogne Art Gallery was founded in 1970 by Angelo Scanzia. Borgagna Art Gallery is located in Borgogna, a small town in northern Italy. Its collection includes paintings, sculptures, and decorative objects. The gallery has a large collection of contemporary art, like abstract art, photography, mixed media and many more. Borgogna Art is an art gallery, a place where you can see and buy contemporary art in large collections. Art gallery brands are not only for artists to sell their art.
